sense.def:
Na sodišču je
a judge
oseba, ki odloči, kako je treba razumeti zakon, na primer kako je treba soditi zločincem.

seg.quote: Last week she appeared before a judge.
Judge Arnason set Miss Davis free on bail.

sense.def:
To be a good judge of something
pomeni nekaj razumeti in o tistem odločati.

seg.quote: He was a good judge of character.

sense.def:
A judge
je tudi oseba, ki izbere zmagovalca na tekmovanju.

seg.quote: The panel of judges consisted of a variety of famous people.

sense.def:
To judge someone or something
pomeni oblikovati si mnenje o nekom ali nečem na podlagi dokazov ali podatkov, ki jih imamo na voljo.

seg.quote: It's impossible to judge her age.
He judged it wiser to put a stop to this quarrel.
I'm not in a position to judge.

sense.def:
To judge a competition
pomeni odločiti, kdo je zmagovalec na tekmovanju.

seg.quote: The competition was judged by the local mayor.
